text: @realDonaldTrump Trump, You do Not care about the Elderly in America, who are dying by the thousands because of your mismanagement of the Coronavirus Pandemic! You, like many Republican Senators & Representatives, only care about remaining in power & putting money in your personal bank accounts! https://t.co/yrQ3lKU9mv
